title: Mount Marapi on Caution status, erupts for 29 seconds
description: The Volcano Post (PGA) of Mount Marapi reported that the eruption of the volcano located in Agam and Tanah Datar Districts, West Sumatra, lasted approximately ...
content: Kota Padang (ANTARA) - The Volcano Post (PGA) of Mount Marapi reported that the eruption of the volcano located in Agam and Tanah Datar Districts, West Sumatra, lasted approximately 29 seconds on Monâ€¦ [+1780 chars]
